ponder.ui.subject: Subject of this scene
ponder.ui.index_description: Click one of the icons below to learn about its associated Items and Blocks
catnip.ui.server_config_unavailable_tool: Gameplay settings can only be accessed from the in-game menu after joining a World or Server
catnip.ui.server_config_locked_tooltip: You do not have enough permissions to edit the server config; you can still look at the current values here though
catnip.ui.server_config_unlocked_tooltip: You have enough permissions to edit the server config; changes you make here will be synced with the server when you save them
catnip.ui.value_entry.relog_required: Changing this value will require a _relog_ to take full effect
catnip.ui.value_entry.restart_required: Changing this value will require a _restart_ to take full effect
catnip.ui.reset_all_button_tooltip: Click here to reset all settings to their default value
catnip.ui.save_changes_button_tooltip: Click here to save your current changes
catnip.ui.discard_changes_button_tooltip: Click here to discard all the changes you made
catnip.ui.resetting_changes_message: Resetting all settings of the %s config. Are you sure?
catnip.ui.leaving_with_changes_message: Leaving with %1$s unsaved %2$s for this config
catnip.ui.relog_required_message: At least one changed value will require you to relog to take full effect
catnip.ui.restart_required_message: At least one changed value will require you to restart your game to take full effect
catnip.ui.other_mods_config_unavailable: This Mod does not have any configs registered or is not using Forge's config system
catnip.util.unable_to_find_config.messag: Unable to find the specified config
